<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Specific Machine Software (v2.0)</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/v2.0/api/tenants/{tenant_id}/machines/{machine_id}/software/{software_id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



List details of a specific machine software.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"The ID of the tenant.","in":"path","name":"tenant_id","required":true,"schema":{"description":"Tenant Id","type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"The ID of the device.","in":"path","name":"machine_id","required":true,"schema":{"description":"Machine Id","type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"The ID of the device software.","in":"path","name":"software_id","required":true,"schema":{"description":"Software Id","type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Successful Operation

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"id"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The device software ID.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"scheduled_upgrade"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The devices for which software upgrades have been scheduled. The list will display a temporary download completed state and then the scheduled upgrade.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"tenant_id"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"ID of the tenant.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"upgrade_interval"} required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The upgrade interval time limit until an upgrade attempt is performed.\n","type":"integer"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"upgrade_version"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The software version for the upgrade. \n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"id\": \"string\",\n  \"scheduled_upgrade\": \"string\",\n  \"tenant_id\": \"string\",\n  \"upgrade_interval\": 0,\n  \"upgrade_version\": \"string\"\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
